project_descr: The restoration of this very important religious monument intends to contribute to the on-going confidence-building process between the Greek Cypriots and Turkish Cypriots communities within the context of cultural heritage preservation and protection.

outputs.output_descr: Peacebuilding and reconciliation processes reinforced through the restoration of the Monastery of Apostolos Andreas, one of Cyprus most iconic heritage site.

document_name: Project Document_Restoration of Apostolos Andreas Monastery
project_title: restoration of the holy monastery of apostolos andreas
